nodes.text: Weapons Factory Alpha, also abbreviated as WF Alpha, was an Imperial weapons factory located on the moon of Cymoon 1, operated by Overseer Aggadeen. It was also one of the largest weapons factories in the galaxy. The Empire insisted the facility was fully automated, but in fact it relied on slavery. Vehicles produced at the factory included 74-Z speeder bikes, All Terrain Armored Transports and TIE/ln space superiority starfighters.
